medium: Paper construction with drypoint and watercolor
title: Construction, Plate 1456
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Edition LLC, in pencil: [Construction Plate 1456]; LRC, in
description: three-dimensional paper construction which extends outward from wall; covered in Plexiglas vitrine; vertical surface has concave irregularly-shaped area at left center, with light and dark blue surface with black lines and textures and black linear element; concave square area in ULQ above irregularly-shaped concave area; vertical surface of pastel pink and blue with black scratchy reverse text-like marks in horizontal lines and horizontal black lines at bottom; curving black linear marks in URQ; conical and spiraling protruding element in black with white, blue, red, and turquoise bars and lines
creditline: Gift of the artist and Robert Brown Gallery
